name: Ki Nana
description:
Heal the world!

The guardian awakens in a barren wasteland. It used to be beautiful here, green and full of life. Now an infestation has destroyed everything. Help the guardian restore the world to its former beauty!

Ki Nana is a student project that was created as part of a master's programme at HAW Hamburg. This playable level is the tutorial for the game.

Get the game here:

Ki Nana Game Download

The team behind Ki Nana:
Annika Heilmann - Programming, Game Design
Shalien Schmidt - 3D Art, Animation, Sound Design
Torben Weit - Game Design, 2D Art, 3D Art
